item.title: Sorting Problem
item.description: Problem Jay likes sequences, so he use to playing with a sequence of size N. He will transform the sequence according to K queries, and the format and process of the queries are as follows: - L R X: Let's say the sequence sorted in ascending order is \( A[1], A[2], â€¦, A[N].

item.title: How to Sort Data
item.description:
Introduction

What this post focus on

This posting will cover almost every concept of How to sort (primary). Plus, I’ll post realistic algorithm problem of our real world so that you can apply those concept to real world problem and learn how to use it. I really hope so.
